entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.125.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix KMS memory leak by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3501
  • Infisical SSH: Add Alias Field to SSH Hosts by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3497
  • Implemented project permission impersonation by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3447
  • feat(reminders): specify recipients by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3453
  • feat(project-permissions): allow users to sort permissions on the UI by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3494
  • feat: github org sync by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3498
  • feat: enabled sso (google, gitlab, github) to bypass org sso by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3471
  • feat(login): Update all SSO login methods to use PKCE by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3495
  • feat: increased secret caching to 10mins with jitter of 2min by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3505
  • feat: add support for eddsa jwt alg for oidc by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3503

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.125.0-postgres...infisical/v0.125.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.125.2-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(secrets-table): UI fix for users with edit permissions but not read secret value permission by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3478
  • feat: strict find filter by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3506
  • doc: added doc for assume privilege feature by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3504
  • feat(secret-sync): TeamCity ignore inherited and non-env values by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3509
  • fix(external-connections): Use Hostname for Blocking Internal IPs DNS Resolve by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.125.1-postgres...infisical/v0.125.2-postgres
